effect.Name: Color Burn
effect.description: Color Burn - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by increasing the contrast between the two. Blending with white produces no change
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Color Burn (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by increasing the contrast between the two. Blending with white produces no change

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable decides which color the divider should be. When the option is off, the divisor is the base colors and when the option is on, the divisor is the blend colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
